idea-plugin.name: MCP Language Service Tools
idea-plugin.description:
Extends JetBrains MCP functionality to expose language service metadata and code intelligence. Provides access to symbols, references, type information, and documentation through MCP tools.

Features:

  • Extract symbols from files with optional hierarchical structure
  • Find symbol definitions with go-to-definition functionality
  • Find all references/usages of symbols
  • Get hover information including types and documentation

MCP Tools Provided:

  • get_symbols_in_file - Extract all symbols from a specific file (supports both flat and hierarchical views)
  • find_symbol_definition - Navigate to symbol definitions
  • find_symbol_references - Find all usages of a symbol
  • get_hover_info - Get type information and documentation for a symbol at a position
